content: @Aaron Hill how do you feel about closing https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/84237 and all related issues as duplicates of https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83538 ? realistically we're not going to get test cases for all of them, right?
The predicates_of issue is not related to trait evaluation - I'm pretty sure all of those are caused by rust-src issues
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/83813 is the first step to fixing that
maybe close it in favor of https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83540 then?
I'm just a little concerned there's so many issues with the same cause we'll forget to close them all
It appears that there are at least two distinct issues with predicates_of
Someone opened https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/84275, which doesn't involve any standard library spans at all
